---
title: "Exploratory Data Analysis"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
# libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(gridExtra)

# load data
ss <- readRDS("Data/ss.RDS") %>%
  mutate(viewcat = as.factor(viewcat))

# ggpplot options
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r}
# viewcat
v1 <- ggplot(ss, aes(viewcat, percnumb)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  ylim(-1, 12)
v2 <- ggplot(ss, aes(viewcat, perclet)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  ylim(-1, 12)
v3 <- ggplot(ss, aes(viewcat, percbody)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  ylim(-1, 12)

gridExtra::grid.arrange(v1, v2, v3, nrow = 1)
```
